name: USD Mapped Token
description: In the fast-paced world of e-commerce, USDM redefines how merchants and users connect. As a blockchain-based rewards token, USDM powers rebates, referrals, and retention through programmable, transparent incentives. In an age where customer engagement defines growth, USDM delivers a smarter way to reward. Designed for transparency and flexibility, USDM empowers merchants to issue on-chain rebates and referral bonuses that users truly own. Built on Ethereum and backed by auditable smart contracts, USDM replaces fragmented point systems with a unified, secure, and future-ready rewards solution.
